name: Harvestris
description:
Get ready for harvest season! Grow your plants carefully so they're ready when the harvest comes!

Plants are ready when they have an equal amount of SUN, WATER, and SOIL. Plants with more resources score more points.

CONTROLS:

Left Mouse Button: Place block

Right Mouse Button: Rotate block

Mouse Scroll Wheel: Adjust volume

Escape: Close game (standalone versions only)

My submission for Ludum Dare 52. You can rate it here: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/52/harvestris
